alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 23 at 2:30PM EST until February 24 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Mahoning River At Leavittsburg affecting Trumbull County. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mahoning River At Leavittsburg. * WHEN...Until late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 12.5 feet, Flood waters encroach on Meadowbrook Drive. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 12.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 12.9 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 12.5 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued late tonight by 1230 AM EST.
